category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Mes0ManageDCDViaTWIEditor
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether Data Collection Definition objects (DCDs) under Process/Operation should be managed by Textual Work Instruction (TWI) editor. Valid values are: * true: DCDs under Process/Operation will be managed by Textual Work Instruction editor. This is the default value. * false: DCDs under Process/Operation will be managed by Product Manufacturing Information (PMI).
